mapper.insert: insert into portfolio(artist_no, title, type, file, content, reg_date, portfolio_private, agree, thumbnail) VALUES (#{artist_no}, #{title}, #{type}, #{file}, #{content}, #{reg_date}, #{portfolio_private}, #{agree}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.update: update portfolio SET title=#{title}, file=#{file}, content=#{content}, revise_date=#{revise_date}, thumbnail=#{thumbnail} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET comment_number = comment_number + #{number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{porfolio_no}
update portfolio SET like_number = like_number + #{number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
